class.description: The class this game object is created from.

id.description: The unique identifier for this game object.

name.description: The image to load as the main sprite for the item.

desc.description:
The image to load as the normal texture for the item. 
(Should look weird and blue. Most filenames in base game end with "n")

texture.description: The path to the texture in Content/textures this object will use.

max_damage.description: Defines how much damage this object can take before being destroyed.
